name: Pirate Ninja Time Travelers
description:
A short dungeon crawler/JRPG hybrid created for P.I.G.Squad's turn-based game summer slow jam (June 2020). Made in Godot 3.2.1 in about 32 hours over a two week period.

Drop any feedback or ideas. I'd love to hear your thoughts on how to grow the project.

Thanks for playing!
